p.d: In a posh neighbourhood, a grandmother decides to give free rein to her love of gossip by writing a blog. The subject is the everyday lives of her neighbours! Directed by: Melyou Akre Loba Diby (CÃ´te d'Ivoire, 2017) Cast: Amy Dagry (the blogger), Serge Quashie (Luc), Cynthia Nassardine (Alice) Genre: comedy Awards: 2nd prize "TV series" at the 2019 Fespaco
